data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=x2M39n3fc1AQ7kNvgHnY5HH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfAhRVudj_CktVriTBeSL4eiRw4w1F0V91i9R3h5GEAoPA&oe=6641F7B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=E8uFL4rHXicQ7kNvgHDgO5L&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfAsXaodKav3BMkBQm-Fx54OKxUMeSgvRy99IkKczhLSVw&oe=66420552)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=jRgR07sV3uIQ7kNvgGBJY2L&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfB_j7G0yn3iR7rGSbfLzkMQkbfU-oCqABoDcupLwWvHOg&oe=664208D0)
